ai-patthana23.18:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.18:0.3_0: Seeing what is good, pleasant and internally,
ai-patthana23.18:1.1_0: He is not skilled in the middle of the Teaching, nor is a condition for the support of the skillful, etc.,
ai-patthana23.18:1.1_1: The sixteen bases have been created, based on the object, and eighteen bases of derived, in the former places produced.
ai-patthana23.18:2.1_0: Not is skilled in making a wholesome quality, not by the external objects,
ai-patthana23.18:2.1_1: The eighteen bases have been created, based on the object, and there is a new state of existence in the past.
ai-patthana23.18:3.1_0: Not skilled in means of an indulging the teaching, etc., with a cause or condition for the object.
ai-patthana23.18:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.18:4.1_0: Not with an unwholesome mental sloth and torpor, without an external object,
ai-patthana23.18:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
